channel.title: Pages on Sushant
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Sushant

item.title: About
item.author: map[username:sushantdhiman host:outlook.com] (Sushant)
item.description: Hello there, I am Sushant, currently living in Chandigarh I am an ECMAScript / JavaScript programmer working on Node.JS / React / Angular / Sequelize. I used to work with PHP (Laravel / Yii) initially, then found interest in Node.JS platform. Try to help OSS community whenever I find some spare time. I am a core contributor at Sequelize. I also contribute to node-mysql2 This is my blog which I use to record things I am currently working on or learning.

item.title: Projects
item.author: map[username:sushantdhiman host:outlook.com] (Sushant)
item.description: Unexpected-Date, A plugin for unexpected.js for date/time assertions Sequelize-Benchmark Benchmarks for Sequelize.js Core Contributor Sequelize ORM, Most popular ORM for Node.js Sequelize CLI, The Sequelize CLI MySQL2, Performant MySQL adapter for Node.js with prepared statements Contributor Unexpected.js, Beautiful Node.js test assertions GraphQL Sequelize Solid Sequelize + GraphQL support tools
